next stitch to be worked off the left hand needle with the crochet hook and pull it through the bead with the crochet hook place the stitch back onto the left hand needle you are now ready to work that stitch https //www wikihow com/knit-with-beads  drop stitch or elongated stitch - go into the stitch knitwise wrap the yarn around the needle two times and complete knitting the stitch on the next row knit once into that stitch dropping the extra wrap creating an elongated stitch this is not increasing the number of stitches do not wrap the yarn around the needle two times before knitting
